data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Alonso, María R., Ibáñez, Miguel (2007): Anatomy and function of the penial twin papillae system of the Helicinae (Gastropoda: Helicoidea: Helicidae) and description of two new, small Hemicycla species from the laurel forest of the Canary Islands. Zootaxa 1482: 1-23, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.176897
